TopicTitle: [1.1.2]Aerojet Kerbodyne 3.0 (4/29/16 Better FX, still good for 1.1.2)

Articles.Content:
Love this mod, awesome job. I just have a small/medium question. The SDHI has room for a scrubber and waterpoofing to work with TAC mod. Is it any config for it?

If you haven't got it yet you can take your pick or use both if you want here is one that does it for the ServiceModule https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/TAC_COVERTER_ServiceModule.cfg.zip and here is one that adds it to the pods https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/TAC_COVERTER_PODS.cfg.zip
Also, the thrusters need some configuration with DRE, they easily survive re-entry even with the settings turned up.

Also, the thrusters need some configuration with DRE, they easily survive re-entry even with the settings turned up.

The modders do alot already and, I really don't see where it's there place to make there mods work with all the other mods out there if people are going to use other mod they really should try and learn how to make patch to get things to work with it and share with other so it will take alittle of your time the modder shared his or hers time sharing there work, We the player can spin alittle of are time too besides whining and please don't take this the wrong way, I'm not trying to be rude at all but we all can help out.

And if you like there mods please give this guys some Rep let them know it's the little star down by blog this post.

The modders do alot already and, I really don't see where it's there place to make there mods work with all the other mods out there if people are going to use other mod they really should try and learn how to make patch to get things to work with it and share with other so it will take alittle of your time the modder shared his or hers time sharing there work, We the player can spin alittle of are time too besides whining and please don't take this the wrong way, I'm not trying to be rude at all but we all can help out.

And if you like there mods please give this guys some Rep let them know it's the little star down by blog this post.

Nah, it's fine, I was working on a .cfg for it as you speak. (it's really the DRE config for the stock RCS jets).

EDIT: Here it is: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xu8qykfy2h97o3x/AreojetKerbodyneRCS.cfg?dl=0

Helping patch up mods is how I came to be as a modder. Also it helps the modder a lot since not only modding is the job to be done, there are also real life business.

Helping patch up mods is how I came to be as a modder. Also it helps the modder a lot since not only modding is the job to be done, there are also real life business.

Also, I want to say thanks to you Blackheart, for making this mod, and the Squad Retexture. Both add to the game a lot more than one would think.
Thanks for the support, that really help a lot in the morale part
Sorry for not responding, I been a little buzy lately. Thanks for the configs. I couldn't make my copying change anything ingame.

Sorry for not responding, I been a little buzy lately. Thanks for the configs. I couldn't make my copying change anything ingame.

There not working for you did you put them in KSP/GameData and have ModuleManager.*.*.* installed ?
The configs shared a few post back work perfect. I mean my own copy-paste work is not good. The only thing not working like it supposed to is my head, so no worries.
Another function added. Oxygen concentrator. I guess it's kind of compressor. It said in CFG it "multiplies the amount". Awesome, thanks for helping. You are gold
Woohoo, updated at last with other plug-ins updated as well. This is untested though so feel free to report back to me if issues occur
Aaaand I'll just leave this here for now :3

Aaaand I'll just leave this here for now :3

http://i.imgur.com/CB1G09c.png

What is that thing? It's too small to be an ICPS, but it's clearly an upper stage of some kind.

What is that thing? It's too small to be an ICPS, but it's clearly an upper stage of some kind.

This is the Delta-K upper stage of the Delta II. It uses the AJ-118K Liquid Fuel Engine
niiiiceeee

This is the Delta-K upper stage of the Delta II. It uses the AJ-118K Liquid Fuel Engine

Nice. It looks really coool

Btw, I think the ICPS might be sorta underpowered. Whenever I try to make a rocket that uses it as an upper stage, it turns out that it'll almost always be better to use something else as an upper stage. Definitely reduce weight of the structure, and perhaps increase the Isp of the engine?
Is the Delta V really far off the other Upper stages you make? I'm really bad at configs, but I'll try to get it balanced.

Is the Delta V really far off the other Upper stages you make? I'm really bad at configs, but I'll try to get it balanced.

It's certainly noticeable. A rocket with a poodle-based upper stage is a good deal smaller than one with a ICPS upper stage. Perhaps it's because of the structural truss being too heavy?
I'm gonna need that upper stage right now Blackheart.
I 2nd that hehe please.

Now, I'm probably doing something stupid here, but I'm pretty sure that the interim cryo stage isn't supposed to do this:

Upon going to the launchpad, it started to automatically play the *poof* decoupling animation and the(upon physics loading, I think) promptly phased into another plane of existence, causing the crew module to pass through it and into the main body(first try was with a procedural fuel tank, second was just stock tanks) of the rocket, resulting in some very pretty explosions. The cryo stage then decided to fly off and do it's own thing, without any prompting(it made it to 80Km before I gave up on it).

Open the game, and recreate the same situation. As soon as it occurs, close the game. Open KSP_win, go to KSP_Data and post the file titled "output_log" using Dropbox or Google Docs. A larger image, and a picture of the craft in the VAB would be helpful too.

Edited February 14, 2015 by sharpspoonful

Open the game, and recreate the same situation. As soon as it occurs, close the game. Open KSP_win, go to KSP_Data and post the file titled "output_log" using Dropbox or Google Docs. A larger image, and a picture of the craft in the VAB would be helpful too.

Okay. https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B4aU9VFkVMnIUHBfd1o5WDRnYnM&authuser=0 Here's the log, the screenshots are in a spoiler as they're quite big.

Here is the craft I was using in the VAB(The shroud and engine are on stage 4 in this picture)

This is it as soon as it loaded onto the pad(The icon for the shroud appears to have disappeared; stage 3, below the engine)

And as soon as it did the poofing appeared on the cryo's shroud with no input from me. I closed KSP just as the upper part began to drop
You wouldn't happen to have NEAR installed, would you?
